subject: Simsonn
description_text: Can I ask questions about your products

conversations.body_text: Hi FATHIU CONSULT,  Could you please tell me what the issue is? Please provide some details.

If I help your Shopify store make $15K quickly, would you be open to a 10
percent share?
Hi FATHIU CONSULT,  May I ask which channels you are using to promote it?

That sounds excellent. To ensure your website starts generating 15k sales,
I’ve developed a highly targeted strategy designed specifically for the
festive season. At this period, the most effective method is EDM Electronic
Direct Marketing.

With EDM, we can reach warm, ready-to-buy customers instantly, drive
consistent traffic to your offers, and convert them faster during peak
demand periods such as, Christmas, and New Year. This approach maximizes
visibility, increases conversions, and positions your brand ahead of
competitors during this critical shopping window.

If you’re ready, I can walk you through the full plan and begin
implementation right away.

Hello Simsonn I'm looking forward to have your response
